charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1), (b)(1)(A)(viii): POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE METHAMPHETAMINE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to the Bureau of Prisons for 120 months on each of Counts 1, 2, and 3 of the First Superseding Information, all to be served CONCURRENTLY. Supervised release for five years, consisting of five years on Count 1 and three years on Counts 2 and 3 of the First Superseding Information, all such terms to run CONCURRENTLY under the terms and conditions of the U. S. Probation Office and General Order 05-02. Special assessment of $300. All fines are waived.

charges.charge_description: 21:841(a)(1)(b)(1)(A)(viii): Possession with Intent to Distribute Methamphetamine(1)

charges.charge_disposition: The Court dismisses all remaining counts of the underlying information as to this defendant.
